E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	"And make your incision such that it easily cuts through that adhesion so that the eyelid returns to its natural form and all the adhesion is healed."
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	"And then you should put saltwater into the eye with which you wash it; or distilled water in which some rosin has been dissolved."
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	"And then separate the eyelid from the eye with a soft cloth and apply to the eye wool soaked in egg white, and on the third day use consolidating ointments so that it heals."
Capitol .xvi.	"Chapter XVI."
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	"Of Incision of Nail and Carnal Eminence of the Lacrimal."
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	"Know that nail can be of two kinds: one is nervous and resembles hard skin; the other is non-nervous and resembles compacted white humor. When you touch it with a scalpel, if it is forced to be taken with forceps, it should be cut off and the forceps should not be inserted into it."
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	"And in both species it begins from the larger lacrimal, gradually approaching the sight and blocking light and eye movement."
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	"But the manner of operating in its incision is that the patient should hold their head in the chair, and then you open the eyelids, elevate the eyelid with your hand, and grasp the nail with forceps of few folds and stretch it out towards its sides."
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	"And then take a needle and insert into it a thread of horse, cow, or ox hide, or something similar, or strong gut, or fold the tip of the needle little by little and insert it into the middle of the nail, pierce with the needle, tie the nail with thread; stretch it out towards its sides, and cut off the side of the nail that blocks the pupil with the thread."
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	"And so you follow it with the thread until its end."
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	"And then you incise the remaining nail at its root with a fine spatula or small forceps, and lift the natural carnal of the lacrimal in such a way that by cutting it there is no continuous flow of tears."
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	"And sometimes the nail is stretched out with one forceps or with thread, as we have said, and then it should be cut off with a lion-shaped spatula, of which this is its shape:"
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	"And take care that with the spatula you do not touch the corneal tunic and that it does not break in it, and that the pupil is pierced."
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	"Then after the incision put a little salted water or fresh honey into the eye and leave it until the next day; then cure it with water that covers it until it is healed."
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	"And if the nail is not nervous and you cannot insert the needle or grasp it with forceps, then this species of nail can be cured with medications and healed as I have said and written in the division."
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	"And if you wish to incise it, then open the eye of the patient and take a sharp lion-shaped spatula like this:"
am subtilitat.	"with great subtlety."
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	"And if it is rarefied and congested and pressed at its root, then distill some of your saliva into the eye with fresh honey or rose water or salted water, and cover the eye until the next day."
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	"And then repeat the operation until all that is of it has been removed, except for the counter-incision cautery in the eye, because when you leave it, cure the cauterization at its beginning until it is healed."
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	"And then repeat your operation on it with reason until it is healed."
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	"The emergence of the carnal lacrimal, if noticed in the eye by great harm, should be suspended with forceps; and cut it from there on one side, and do not extend the incision too much so that you do not cut off tear flow."
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	"And then distill rose water and fresh honey into the lacrimal until it is healed."
Capitol .xvii.	"Chapter XVII."
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	"Of Incision of a Pterygium and of What is Born from Adherent Carnal in the Eye."
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	"Sometimes in the eyes of some people, rough carnal is born and it covers the pupil or approaches and presses against the eyelids so that when they close their eyelids are pressed together and assembled like a ballast."
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	"The operation for this is that the patient holds their head downwards and then you open their eyes and grasp all of that carnal with suitable forceps or a claw; then cut off the carnal at its beginning until it is finished with scissors, taking care not to harm the eye during your operation."
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	"And your incision should be with that which you cut off those or with the spatula that we have mentioned in the incision of the nail or with small forceps with which it is grasped according to its shape, as appropriate for this chapter."
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	"Then when your incision is completed and all that carnal has been removed, then fill the eye with salted water or distill rough powder like that of corrosive medicines into it and compress it externally with egg white until it is securely cauterized."
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	"And if there remains some cause of the pterygium and it is slightly cauterized, and you fear cauterization, then leave the eye and cure that cauterization with what calms it, and then repeat the operation until it is healed, and do the same for adherent carnal that occurs in this type of eye."
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	"But you should always refrain from any cure of the eye by natural or accidental means with iron, and do not put your hand on any of these operations until you see that that member can withstand that operation."
Capitol .xviii.	"Chapter XVIII."
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	"Of Removal of a Foreign Body in the Eye."
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	"There are rough foreign bodies that stick to the eye and prohibit its vision for many days."
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	"Therefore, at the beginning you should consider if the eye in which there is a foreign body is strong and does not have any other illness besides the foreign body, then grasp that foreign body."
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	"And have the patient hold their head downwards and then suspend those veins with one or two forceps according to your discretion; and let that forceps be of subtle duplication in this form:"
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	"or two forceps graduating in one body in this form:"
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	"Now carefully tie those veins with fine forceps, with delicacy, and remove the blood immediately, before you see those veins becoming empty and turning pale."
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	"Be careful not to cut the blood vessels at the tip of the scalpel. And if your operation is done in front of the sun, make sure you are steady during the procedure so that you only cut those veins."
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	"And once you have completed this, then distill on the wound's chief vein some wine vinegar or rose water so that with its sharpness it may corrode what has escaped from the scalpel."
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	"But if this is not possible for you, then collect all of it at that moment and later apply on it whatever relieves the pain of it, and leave it alone for a few days until the pain has ceased and assured that no abscess forms."
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	"And repeat this operation over it according to the manner most suited until it is healed."
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	"And this is the method of the forceps:"
Capitol .xix.	"Chapter XIX."
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	"On the reduction of deviated nasal septum."
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	"If you treat a deviated septum with cautery or sharp medicine according to the report of it and it does not heal, then do not enter into it but rather make an incision over the abscess when it reaches maturity, and remove all the moisture that is in it until the bone appears."
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	"And then, once the bone is exposed and you see corruption or blackness in it, then scrape it with an instrument of which this is the shape:"
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	"And it is named 'sharp head' and should be made of iron. It should have a round head, like grasping something which has been punctured with the point of a lime or subtly punched with an awl, as seen in the following shape:"
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	"And press that upon the location of the corruption on the bone, and then twist it between your fingers little by little until you know that all of the corruption has been scraped away."
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	"And do this several times, and then restore the location with drying and astringent causes."
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	"Therefore if the location is consolidated and good flesh has grown in it and the skin has separated from the healthy part and remains for forty days without renewing or becoming abscessed or having any accidents, then you know that it is healed."
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	"But if not, then do not enter into it but rather reduce the fissure to the shape of the nose, and do so in this manner: First uncover the bone with a saw or sharp medicine. Once the bone is exposed, then take a chisel of this shape:"
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	"The end of the iron should be triangular, and the shaft should be slenderly tapered towards the point, like this:"
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	"And then place it upon the bone near the lacrimal duct. Extend your hand a little way from the hole and then twist your hand with the chisel until all of the bone has penetrated, and that you can feel the pain by the air that comes out through there when you move your hand."
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	"Then restore the location with astringent drying medicines as you have been taught."
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	"So when the flesh grows and the location hardens, then the matter which was flowing outwards returns to the nose. Therefore, it is easier to deal with this condition."
Capitol .xx.	"Chapter 20."
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	"Concerning the reduction of the prominence of the nostril."
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	"When the nostril becomes prominent in its entirety and there is no apparent injury or diminution, then it is necessary to relieve the condition. Then follow this procedure: First shave the hair around the area without scarification and suck with good suction. Then place a liniment made of gum acacia, aloe, mallow, and tragacanth on the nostril, and finally apply a plaster made of fine powder."
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	"And the manner of making the powders is as follows: Take drachms of lion's mane, and fold each one in four pleats. Then pulverize them."
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	"And then place them on top of each other according to the amount that the nostril requires."
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	"And then apply a hard cloth with strong compression on top of them. Then repeat the suction cups without scarification and remove them, leaving the nostril pressed tightly day and night."
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	"But if the bandage becomes softened in the meantime, then it must be tightened."
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	"And remove the bandage day and night as we have said."
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	"And if sometimes the nostril is already reduced, that is good. But if not, then repeat the plaster with the powders and compression and suction cups until it is healed."
Capitol .xxi.	"Chapter 21."
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	"Concerning the incision of the prominence of the uvula."
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	"When there is a disruption in the uvula and it becomes prominent and projects outside the eyelids like a grain of wheat, and has an elongated shape resembling that of a man, and you wish to incise it, then do so as follows: Insert the needle into the ridge of the uvula from below upwards. Then insert another needle on which there is doubled thread on the side towards the lacrimal duct. Make this penetrate and leave the first needle in its position. Then cut the location where the double thread is, and lift away the part of the uvula with that, following the course of the needle. Then pull it tight."
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	"And then remove the needle and place lanum infused in albumen on the nostril, leaving it there until the thread falls out with the uvula."
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	"And then heal the nostril with whatever comforts it until the wound is healed."
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	"And sometimes it happens that the entire nostril is swollen with a circular prominence. Then it should be punctured with a fine probe that comes to the front of the nostril, allowing the whitish fluid to run off, and the nostril will quickly descend."
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	"And then compress it until it is healed."
Capitol .xxii.	"Chapter 22."
De curacio de alconati.	"Concerning the treatment of ophthalmia (inflammation of the eye)."
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	"This condition called ophthalmia is nothing but moisture that is accumulated in the nostril like descending water, and it is not this."
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	"But the manner of treating it is as follows: Make the person sit on a prepared and upright chair. Then take your head in both your hands and lift it up so that you see the moisture running down to the lower part. Then dry it quickly before it descends, and close the eyes, leaving them to see again."
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	"And if it does not run downwards, know that it is water."
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	"But if the descent of the moisture is not prepared as we have said, then make the person sit between your hands. Then take a fine probe and make it pass through the skin surrounding one little below the continuation of the conjunctiva with the corneal tunic in the limbus (inside the eye), so that the moisture is removed."
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	"Then, once it has been removed, distill into the nostril warm water in which you have mixed honey or water in which you have boiled fenugreek and honey."
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	"And then treat it with other causes until it is healed."
Capitol .xxii.	"Chapter 23."
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	"Concerning the treatment of descending water from the nostril."
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	"We have already spoken about the types of moisture in the division and which one it is appropriate to pierce with speech, declaring that according to health."
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	"Then you should make the person sit between your hands on a stool and pull their own nostril tightly with their hand."
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	Approach and place your left hand near the eyelid of the patient's left eye, if their left eye is the one with water. Otherwise, use your right hand.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	Approach and with your right hand take a cloth if the patient's eye is left; otherwise, use your left hand.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Approach and place the edge of the cloth near the corner of the eye, about the thickness of a thread away from the inner lacrimal lacuna. Then gently press the cloth with your hand in that spot.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	Then penetrate into the eye and feel that the cloth has reached the tear duct opening.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	Make sure that the path of the cloth reaches the preconjunctival fornix as measured from the distance between the pupil and the end of the black part, which is the corner of the eye; so that you can see the pupil clearly through the transparency of the corneal tunic.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	Then keep the cloth in place where there is water. Then quickly pull it down once or twice more, and then if the water flows down immediately, the patient's visual acuity will improve immediately, and the cloth will be wet with tears.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	Then pause for a moment; then if the water has flowed down, pause once again but this time making sure that the cloth does not get wet.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	Then when it's dry and no water flows down, gently remove the cloth with your hand little by little. Then dissolve a small amount of gemstone clear salt in the water and use that to rinse the inside of the eye. Then wipe away any excess moisture from outside the eye using cotton wool or gauze soaked in rose oil and alum. Then close the patient's eye gently with a soft cloth.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	But those who are of our time pause here, having completed this operation using a thread made of wool.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the cloth does not enter easily into the eye due to its stiffness — for some men have eyes that are very hard — then you must take a spatula called an "albreda" which has the following shape:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	Then pierce with it the conjunctiva, and do not push your hand too far in, but rather make a pathway for the cloth to enter subtly if necessary.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	And then insert the cloth as we have said.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	"You must prepare the final touches of your work: a sleeping area should be arranged for the patient, with dim lighting in a dark room where they can lie on their back. All movements are to be prohibited."
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	"And pause the nature of the water so its nature is clear and it does not harm their head on either the right or left departure."
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	"And arrange for the bandage according to its position within the third day."
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	"Remove the bandage in that dark room and expose their eyes to a gentle light, showing them some causes, and then return the bandage on the seventh day."
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	"And do not forget to do this during the hours of treatments or immediately after infusion."
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	"Be careful not to spill any water due to its delicate balance between calm and strong currents."
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	"But if an abscess forms, you must remove the bandage on the seventh day, and apply water that softens the abscess."
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	"Then uncover the patient's eyes and pause over their mouth for several days so that they may regain their vision in a dark room."
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	"And gradually lead them out of that room, explaining the causes to them."
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	"But remember that in this state, it is not permitted for anyone to have visions, and therefore you must be careful about the operation."
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	"And now it has come to our attention that some people claim to have been initiated into the Art, and one of them said that fire was made in the Airy during the night, using a tube with which water is sucked up."
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	"But yet we have not seen anyone in our land who has perfectly achieved this, nor is it mentioned in any of the books of the ancient ones; and therefore it may be a new invention."
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	"And these are the forms of the species of Magdalen that they claim to have above those who are ignorant of them:"
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	"And these are made of iron or steel properly tempered, and they have their extremities adorned with this subtlety triangularly, the pointed extremity thus like that one."
Capitol .xxiv.	"Chapter XXIV."
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	"Of the treatment of flesh eaten by the nose."
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	"When different kinds of flesh emerge from the nose, connected but with some cause that resembles a scorpion or polyp, this ailment is called 'polypus' due to its resemblance to said fish."
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	"The flesh [of the polyp] is cancerous, decayed, of dark color; yet it is flesh lion-colored not dark."
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	"Therefore, in that which is in these lion-colored flesh without deceit or cancerous growth, you should remove the ailment with your hands and place it in the sun, cover its nostrils, and pierce its throat there."
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	"And properly cut that at the parts of the body, and also separate what you have grasped with spatula sharp and subtle from one part until you know all flesh has been removed; but if something remains due to some cause where excision is possible, then remove it with one of the sharp instruments easily and skillfully until nothing remains."
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	"But if it is accompanied by blood or an aposteme cauterize it with what is necessary; but if it is of malignant apostemes then cut and cauterize there until it has been severed, cauterized, and all cavities opened."
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	"And properly let it be placed on the nose close to the incision with vinegar and water or vinegar."
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	"But if the nose is open and moisture proceeds from it into the palate, then you know that it has been healed."
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	"But if moisture does not penetrate as it should, then you know that there is flesh left in the pus-filled cavities of the nostrils which have not been reached by excision."
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	"Therefore you should insert fleece into it where there is any thickness, and pack it with packs, pressing between each pack the quantity of a finger or less, and generate warmth and insert one extremity of the fleece into the nostrils with the ray or with some other cause which is possible for it."
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	"And after that has been done, let him throw his breath into the nostrils until it reaches the canals of the nostrils, and let it be exhaled over the sieve, for many people have seen schoolchildren do this semblance, and it is a light cause for anyone who wishes to do so."
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	"And properly press the two extremities of the fleece, one extremity which comes out over the nose and the other which remains in the nose, and properly administer a lock of flesh with packs that are on the fleece, and do this until you know that the flesh is already with the packs of the fleece."
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	"And properly extract the fleece, and press it on the nose near the abstraction of blood once a day, and do this for three days or more until the salve has rotted everything that remains of the flesh."
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	"And properly at the end of the treatment, place a lead cannula in the nose for several days until it is healed."
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	"But if you choose a drying cure, use that one."
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	"And this is the form of the head purging device with which oils and medicines are distilled into the nostrils:"
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	"It should be made of silver or brass, resembling a small open lantern like a small cauldron, and the mesh similarly."
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	"And if you wish, make a closed cannula like a pipe, and the cannula of the head purging device should be flat and open; on which you can hold it when you pour oil or water into it that you want from the juices and succussible causes."
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	"And these head purges are costly: take from beyond the castor oil, white balm, ginger, and saffron pepper long, scammony, myrrh, and spikenard of the East. vi. Combine them with beet juice and cabbage juice, and make pills out of them, and let one pill be taken with hot water, and let it be given into the nostrils of the sick person lying towards."
Capitol .xxv.	"Chapter XXV."
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	"Of holes made in the extremities of the nose."
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Many times a thread appears on the outer edge of the nose, which becomes enlarged and inflamed during certain days when it is considered a bad omen.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	Therefore, you should insert that at the beginning of its appearance and remove all of it.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	Furthermore, pause on the place where cauterization or burning medicine was applied, which is located there.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	But if its incision is delayed until it becomes enlarged, then consider whether it is hardened, hard, of dark color and insensitive. In that case, do not touch it with iron for it is a cranky abscess; for many times this abscess was incised with great harm to the person on whom it appeared.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is of lion-like touch and not of dark color, sometimes incision is possible there, so evacuate the illness and incise it without fear, and cure the place with something that dries and constrains until it heals.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter XXVI
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	Regarding the suture of the nose, lips, and ear when continuity is disrupted by plague or injury.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Know that when disruption of continuity occurs in one of these cartilages (nose, lips, ear), you should not rely on this operation except with skilled hands.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when you find such a cause in someone, examine whether it is fresh with its blood. Then join the two lips of the wound with stitches and cure it properly until it heals.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the lips of the disrupted continuity are already separated and each is healthy on its own, then you must cut each part from its attachment until bleeding ceases.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then join the two lips with stitches and strain them together. Sprinkle dragon's blood powder and frankincense on it, place a piece of diaphoretic plaster or another consolidating plaster over it, and let it stay for two to three days. Then remove the plaster and replace it. Let it heal by itself until the edges are united, and then cure it with ointment until it is healed.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	But the manner of stitching is that you should join the disruption of continuity either with needles as we have recommended for abdominal suturing, or join it with thread as you know how to do.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter XXVII:
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	"Regarding the extraction of those causes that appear in both lips within the intestines."
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	"Very often, many men have hard swellings in the inner parts of their lips, resembling kernels of grapes. Some are smaller and others are larger."
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	"It is necessary that you separate the lips and make an incision on each of those hardnesses wherever they are located. After the extraction, fill the space with a bandage soaked in hot water, wash the area with vinegar, and then apply a medicine that has astringent properties until it heals."
Capitol .xxviii.	"Chapter XXVIII."
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	"Regarding the incision of attached flesh in the gums."
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	"Often, there is a boil above the attached gum which ancient authorities called albulus. Therefore, you should suspend it with forceps or hold it with your fingers and incise it along its root, allowing the pus to flow out freely."
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	"And afterwards apply a bandage soaked in hot water or other powders having astringent or absorbent properties."
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	"If that flesh returns, incise it again and cauterize it with a hot iron, for if you cauterize it, it will not return."
Capitol .xxix.	"Chapter XXIX."
De razo de dentz am ferr.	"Regarding the cause of toothache with iron."
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	"When the surface of teeth, both deciduous and permanent, as well as the attached gums become rough, reddened, and sometimes blackened or emit a foul odor causing inflammation in the gum tissue, it is because of corruption, and the teeth themselves are loose."
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	"And therefore you should make an incision between your teeth and grasp the head of the tooth with forceps to extract it. Clean the surface of the teeth where those rough patches appeared, resembling sandpaper, ensuring that there is no other cause for its removal. This procedure is necessary due to blackening or yellowing, and other alterations."
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	"So if you are not able to perform this procedure at the beginning of the extraction process, then repeat the explanation on another day and again on the second and third days until you achieve your desired result."
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	"And know that teeth require various types of forceps with different shapes and figures according to the preparation for your operation."
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	"And therefore the forceps used to extract deciduous teeth is different from those used to remove other teeth. You should prepare these various forms of forceps which you will see shortly:"
Capitol .xxx.	"Chapter XXX."
D’eradicacio de dentz.	"On the extraction of teeth."
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	"You should carefully examine the tooth causing pain beforehand and during every extraction procedure, for there is no reason why you would need to look at it again after its removal. This is because the extracted tooth is a sublimated substance that serves as an excuse in its extraction."
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	"But when the pain is so severe that it requires tooth extraction, you must be firmly certain about which tooth is causing the pain. For often, the pain may seem to come from a healthy tooth and you extract it, only for the pain to continue until the actual offending tooth is removed, as we have already seen in operations involving beards."
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	"So when you are certain about which tooth is causing the pain and know it well, then you should scarify the area around the tooth with a spatula containing some caustic substance to dissolve the gum tissue completely. Then gradually use your fingers or delicate forceps to widen the opening until the tooth becomes loose."
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	"And then apply forceps with a large mouth and strong grip for good purchase or strong leverage. Grasp the head of the offending tooth firmly between your thumb and index finger so that it does not slip away from you. Then gently pull out the tooth in a straight manner, taking care not to break it or cause unnecessary pain."
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	"And if it is not forgotten, then take one of those instruments and place it on either side of the tooth with ease and force to facilitate its removal as was done at the beginning."
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	"But if the tooth is decayed or damaged, then you should fill that cavity with wax and strengthen it using a fine wire tip to prevent it from breaking during your gripping of it with forceps."
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	"And you should work carefully with your scarification around the entire area of the gum and guard against using too much force so that you do not break or fracture it. Then return to the offending tooth with renewed effort to remove it, for the pain caused by its removal will be greater than the initial pain."
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	"And beware of doing what many ignorant barbers do in their haste and arrogance regarding tooth extraction, without administering what we have recommended. For often they cause great illnesses upon people which are more difficult to heal than they were to cause. They leave behind root remnants or some of them, or extract teeth with pieces of the jawbone attached, as we have often witnessed."
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	"And after the extraction, wash out the mouth with warm water or vinegar mixed with salt."
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	"And if bleeding occurs afterwards, as it often does, then apply some powdered myrrh and sprinkle it over the wound. If this is not sufficient, cauterize."
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	"The shape of the delicate forceps and tenacula used to grasp the tooth at the beginning should be long in its tip, short in its handle, and thick enough that they do not bend when you use them."
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	"And they should have such a thick handle that even when you squeeze them with all your might, they will not bend or be shortened at their tips."
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	"And they should be made of Indian iron, carefully straightened at their tips. The tips of these forceps should have teeth that interlock with each other and grasp firmly when squeezed together. Sometimes the tips are shaped like the beak of a bird called the ciconia (stork), which is broad and has strong grasping power."
Capitol .xxxi.	"Chapter XXIX"
De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	"On the Extraction of Teeth and the Removal of Fractured Jaw Bones"
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When extraction of a tooth that is firmly set requires some cause, then you should place yourself close beside it with your hand for one or two days until the area becomes softened; and then insert a sponge or tenaculum whose ends are assembled like the beak of a bird called ciconia or guanta, in this shape:
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The ends of them are made within thus like a file or rasp.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if you do not succeed with this extraction using these forceps or tenacula, then you should uncover the root and remove all the flesh and insert this instrument called atali, which is a small lever whose shape is as follows:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	And it should be of short thick extremity, not bent in such way that it is not firmly held.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	Therefore if by means of this the root is removed, good! And if not, help yourself with these other instruments whose shapes are as follows: The shape of the first instrument is that of a triangular extremity with some thickness:
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The shape of the second tool should be triangular and have a very fine tip.
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	And once you've helped with this instrument, having two branches, one is shaped like this:
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	and there are other instruments that resemble teeth-cutters; for it is made with this instrument, which resembles an oven hook, and this is the shape:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	of a triangular tip that is bent or shortened, which should be somewhat thick, and not pointed so as not to be sharp.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And you should know that the instruments for removing teeth are similar in shape to other instruments.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	But the skilled and subtle craftsman finds suitable instruments for himself according to what is necessary for the operation and various illnesses. For there are certain illnesses about which ancient physicians did not devise or provide appropriate instruments due to their diverse forms.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	But if the jawbone or other bones of the mouth are broken or dislocated, it is necessary to carefully examine that area with suitable instruments and forceps for extracting tooth roots, as we have mentioned previously. Here is a gesture that represents this action:
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	"There may be some swelling present gradually, which should be held or compressed with the mouth to prevent it from escaping until all the bone is removed; then restore the area with appropriate medicines."
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	"If there is a small wound in the bone, clean it thoroughly and remove any blackened tissue. Then dress it until it heals."
Capitol .xxxii.	Chapter XXXII
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	"Concerning the treatment of prominent teeth compared to others."
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When teeth are prominent beyond their natural course causing disfigurement, especially in women and venerable old women; therefore you should consider: if the tooth is not close to another tooth, and cannot be straightened or pulled out, then extract it; but if it is attached to another tooth, then cut it with this instrument which resembles a pig's bone, made of Indian steel with an extremely sharp tip.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And make your incision so that in three days you will have cut through the hardness of that tooth without affecting any other teeth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is an emergent tooth to be filed down, then file it with an Indian steel file which has this shape:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And let it be made entirely of Indian steel and very sharp-pointed; and let it have many small points like those of a file with which the teeth are filed little by little over many days with ease, so that no other tooth is affected or injured.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	And finally smooth it off at the end and polish it with sharp razors.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if it is a tooth with one side chipped and irritating the tongue, then you should file down that edge until its roughness is smoothed out and flattened, so that the tongue does not stumble or speech is not impaired.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Chapter 33
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	Of restoring broken teeth with gold foil or silver wire
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When teeth are broken by concussion or extraction due to a blow or fall and the patient cannot eat properly despite your treatment with astringent medicines, then you should restore those that have been damaged using gold foil rather than silver wire, because silver tarnishes quickly and becomes smooth in just a few days, whereas gold never changes.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And let the foil be of such fineness and thinness according to the quantity that can fit between the teeth; and the way to prepare it is to take the foil and fold it double in length between two healthy teeth, then carefully twist the folded foil between one or more broken teeth until the cloth reaches the healthy part on the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then insert the wadding into the beginning of the broken part and gently press with your finger with skill until it is well placed without causing further damage.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And let your pressure be such that you push the foil deep into the roots of the teeth so that it does not slip out.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then trim the excess ends of the foil with forceps or scissors, and gather those in each place with wax, and hide them under the healthy tooth and the broken tooth so that they do not harm the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then let it set firmly like mortar.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	But if it becomes loose or broken, press it again with more foil in the same manner at all times.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	And this is the form of teeth and the method of restoration for two healthy teeth and two broken ones, as shown in these illustrations:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when one or two teeth return to their proper places after extraction and have been restored as recommended, but still feel loose
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	Only a skilled and knowledgeable artisan can do this.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	And sometimes a bone from an ox is prepared in the shape of a tooth and placed in the space where a tooth is missing, and it is pressed down as described earlier, and it remains there and serves for a long time.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter 34
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Of cutting the frenulum that comes on the tongue and obstructs speech
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This ligament, which sometimes naturally attaches to the underside of the tongue or is accidentally attached due to a healed wound, can obstruct speech.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	And the procedure for this is to open the patient's mouth with their head held back, raise their tongue, and then cut the nerve ligament diagonally until the tongue is freed from its attachment.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	But if there is hardness or stiffness in that ligament due to scar tissue from a healed wound, then use tweezers and cut it diagonally until you have completely severed the ligament and released the stiffness.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	Be careful not to make a deep incision in the front of the flesh, and cut carefully so as not to cause bleeding.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	Then rinse the incision site with warm water or vinegar or fresh water; then apply a linen bandage to the underside of the tongue. This is how the patient should hold their tongue in place at all times to prevent it from healing again later.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	But if bleeding occurs, apply a wet cloth soaked in vinegar to the area; but if the bleeding continues, then cauterize the area with a hot iron specifically designed for this purpose.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then treat it with the other causes until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter 35
De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	Removal of a ranula from under the tongue
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Sometimes, tumors develop beneath the tongue, preventing it from functioning normally and making speech difficult.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	The operation involves opening the patient's mouth wide while they face the sun, examining the tumor closely
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	And if you find it dark or black in color and hard, such that the patient feels no pain thereupon, do not touch it for it is a cancer
E si es declinat a blancor, en le qual es humiditat, lahoras tu met le onci en lu, e inscideys aquel am spatum subtil, e inscindeys le de tota partida; e si sanc te ventz en la hora de la tua operacio, lahoras tu pausa desus zegi trissat, so es vetriol, entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	And if it appears white and wet, then you should place the cautery on it and cut that thin mucus membrane completely with a scalpel; but if blood appears during the operation, then pause briefly until the bleeding stops before applying the cautery
E aprop retorna a la obra tua entro que lo haias trayt am compliment de lu, entro que sia lavat am vi agre e sal; e cura aquel am l’autra curacio ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then return to your work and complete it until it is healed with care using wine mixed with salt and water; continue treating it with the other cures until it is fully healed
Capitol .xxxvi.	Chapter xxxvi
De extraccio de apostema de doas aurelhas e de aquel que es nada en le golayro e de las autras apostemas.	On the extraction of tumors from the ears and those that are located in the throat, as well as other tumors.
Quan endeveno en le golayro godat, so son glandulas las quals son asembladas algodat, las quals accideysso deforas e son nompnadas doas aurelhas, las quals quan tu las curas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no es sanat, lahoras tu considera si le apostema es dur, de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr.	When tumors appear in the throat area, they are usually glandular and consist of adipose tissue that extends outward. These are called "ears," and if you treat them with water as described earlier but they do not heal, then consider whether the tumor is hard, dark colored, and insensitive. If so, do not touch it with an iron instrument.
E si es de roga color e la razic es grossa, lahoras no toques aquela am ferr per le flux del sanc; abantz layssa aquel entro sia madurat, e lahoras o tu trauqueras aquel, o sira romput per si.	And if it is red in color and the root is large, then do not touch it with an iron instrument due to the flow of blood. Instead, wait until it matures, and then either extract it or let it break open on its own.
E si es de blanqua color, radon, e la razit de lu es subtil, lahoras aquel es que cove esser inscidit.	And if it is white in color, hard, and has a thin root, then it should be cut.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras, denant la tua operacio, si ja ha repausat le apostema de lu caut am repaus complit o si es deminuit am alcuna deminucio; e lahoras fay sezer le malaute denant le soleyl, e·l cap de lu sia en le tieu se, e huebre la boca de lu, e le servidor prenent entre las suas mas prema la lengua de lu dejos am instrument mot noble del qual aquesta es la forma:	And before performing the operation on it, consider whether the tumor has already rested after being cauterized completely or if it has decreased in size. Then perform the surgery early in the morning and with the sun behind you. Hold the patient's head firmly in place, open their mouth wide, and have your assistant press down on the tongue using a fine instrument called a "mouth gag," which is shaped like this:
E sia fayt de argent o de aram, e sia subtil cum cotel.	And it should be made of silver or bronze, thin as possible and sharp as a razor.
Donc cum tu premes am aquel la lengua e es mostrat a tu la apostema, e catz sobre aquel le tieu vezement, lahoras pren onci e fica aquel en l’amenla, e tira aquel a las partidas defora tant quant podes.	Then, with the mouth gag in place and the tumor exposed, make an incision over it using your scalpel. Then grasp the tumor with forceps and hold it firmly in place while you cut away as much of its outer portion as possible.
Otra aquo que tiras alcuna causa de las tunicas, e aprop incideys aquela am instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	Then, after cutting away some of the connective tissue, make a deeper incision into the tumor using an instrument shaped like this:
e es asemblat a forceps, empero las extramitatz de lu son corvadas, ayssi que l’orrifici de quascuna de aquelas es en le endreyt del autra, mot agudas, le qual sia de ferr indi enbegut.	This instrument resembles forceps, but its tips are curved so that the cutting edges of each tip face inward towards one another. It should be made of hardened steel.
Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.	"If this tool is not available to you, then cut one using a spatula, the shape of which is as follows: sharp on one side, not sharp on the other."
E pus que has inscidit una mella, inscideys l’autra segon aquesta meteyssa manieyra de inscizio, e aprop la inscizio le malaute guarguarise de aygua frega	"And since you have cut one hole, cut the other in this same manner of incision, and then rinse the patient's wounds with warm water"
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, guarguarise aygua de decoccio de scorsa de milgrana o de fuelha de mirtra e semblantz ad aquel de las causas stiptiquas entro que·l flux del sanc sia restreyt, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	"But if there is bleeding, rinse with water of decoction of oak bark or myrtle leaves and similar remedies that have astringent properties to stop the bleeding, and then dress the wound once it is healed."
E alcunas veguadas naysso en le guolayro autras apostemas otra aquelas doas aurelhas, e inscideys aquelas segon que yeu e dit en la inscizio de doas mellas engualment.	"Sometimes there are other abscesses around the wound, and you should cut those as I have described for the incision of two equal holes."
E yeu ja fu medicat una femna de apostema le qual era nat en le golayro de lu, le qual apostema tendia a color fusca, de pauc sentiment, le qual ja havia claus le golayro de lu, e la femna respirava am meat streyt, e ja havia prohibit a lu comestio e beure de aygua, e ja era pervenguda a la mort si mays agues stat per un dia o per dos.	"And I had already treated a woman with an abscess that had grown in her wound, which tended towards a dark color and little sensation, the wound had already closed, and the woman was breathing with great difficulty, she had already been forbidden to eat or drink water, and she would have died if not for my care over one or two days."
E l’apostema ja tant havia pugat que havia mezes dos ramps entro que eyssiro per dos traucs.	"And the abscess had grown so much that it had sent out two branches through two passages."
Donc yeu me cuytegui fisturalment e fiquegui en un de lor onci, e tiregui aquel, e atirada es de lu gran porcio, e aprop yeu incidigui aquela de on comprendegui del autre trau, e aprop yeu obrigui la boca de lu, e compremegui la sua lengua, e aprop yeu fiquegui le onci en aquela apostema.	"So I inserted a cauterizing tool and left it in one of those openings, and pulled out what I could, then cut off as much as possible from the other passage, and I opened that mouth and compressed her tongue to prevent her from swallowing her own blood."
E aprop yeu abscizi gran partida de lu, e no corria de lu sino un pauc de sanc.	"And so you removed a large part of it, and only a small amount of blood was flowing from it."
Donc absolut es le guolayro de aquela femna, e comensec tantost beure aygua, e aprop presec vianda, donc yeu no cessegui inscidir de aquela apostema motas vetz per lonc temps, e succesia apostema en loc de aquel, le qual inscizia entro que es prolonguat aquel.	"Therefore, it is absolutely necessary to heal that woman immediately. She should start drinking water right away and then promptly take food. Even though the boil was incised many times over a long period, another boil appeared in its place, which continued to spread."
Donc yeu engen agui e cauterizegui le guolayro de lu, donc astec de addicio; e aprop yeu perambulegui e no saubi que fec Dieus de aquela aprop mi.	"So I applied a poultice and cauterized the boil on her, then added some more. And promptly, she got up and walked around, not knowing what God had done for her right away."
Capitol .xxxvii.	Chapter XXXVII
De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada.	Of the incision of a boil when it is swollen
Quan catarr deysen a la huvula, e es apostemada e es longa, lahoras ela es nompnada perpendicular; e si es en la partida dejos grossa e redonda, e lahoras ela es apelada buba.	When pus comes out of the boil, and it is swollen and elongated, then it is called perpendicular; but if it is at the start quite thick and round, then it is called a bubo.
Mays quan es curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio, e no comfereys la tua curacio, e eyssament ja vezes que apostema caut ja es ostat de lu e es subtil, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquela que es agreguadas redonda; e si es ad aquela longitut, e es sanguina, de fusca color o de negre, e no es a lu centiment, lahoras cove que tu temtes la inscizio de lu, quar en aquela es temor sobre le malaute.	But when it is cured with what we have said in the division [of medicine], and your remedy does not help, and especially if sometimes even after cauterization the boil remains hard and subtle, then you should incise that which is rounded and joined together; and if it is of that length, and it is bleeding, of dark color or black, and there is no heat in it, then you should be cautious about incising it, for there is danger over the illness.
E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa, que tu fassas sezer le malaute e premas la lengua de lu am instrument del qual procesic la sua forma e aprop fica le onci en la nuva, e tira aquela en jos e inscideys aquela am un de dos instrumentz les quals e ditz en la inscizio de dos mellas.
