Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is native flesh in the place of the adhesion that is behind it, then you must cut all that which belongs to it, and remove the skin as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, once your operation is completed, then you should fill the wound with lanolin infused in rose oil and wine; and also cure it with another ointment inside so that it may heal.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter LXIV
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	Of the treatment of hernias that are due to wind.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	Wind is an abscess enclosed by some enveloping substance like a bud with softening of the testicles. It becomes difficult to perform exercises and walk around due to this condition.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And the treatment for this ailment is through fear of that from which it is preceded by recall.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, I must say operation in that according to what was first said.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And I say that you should make an incision on the hernia above an elevated thigh; and then peel away the suspensory ligament of the testicles from its attachments on both sides; also tie up the chain of veins with your fingers, taking care not to squeeze them too hard. Then have another assistant help you extend the scrotum vigorously.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	"Then make an incision with a sharp scalpel through a transverse section on the right side of the vessels where they are exposed."
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	"And then remove all parts that we have mentioned earlier in the extraction of arrows, which are located on the temples."
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	"And then place in that area a needle with doubled thread and tie it at the first point where you saw the wound, and tie it again at the last one."
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	"And then cut that area in a straight section along the length of the body and remove what has accumulated from the foul and corrupted humidity."
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	"And then treat the wound with cure for other wounds where you want healthy flesh to be generated, because veins which nourish one of two testicles are affected by this."
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	"But if all the vessels are affected, then it is necessary that the testicles be removed or that they be tied off with the vessels, because they should be deprived of all nourishment due to the incision of the vessels, and they should be cauterized, or else they will not be useful."
Capitol .lxv.	"Chapter 65."
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	"Regarding the treatment of intestinal hernias."
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	"The occurrence of this hernia is due to a separation that occurs on the diaphragm expanded over the abdomen by the angles of the hole in the abdomen, allowing some intestines from that rupture to protrude through it."
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	"And this rupture is either of the diaphragm or of an incision in it, and these two kinds occur due to many causes: namely, percussion, blows, coughing, crying out loudly, elevation caused by some heavy cause, or sneezing."
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	"And the symptom of that, when it is due to an extension of the diaphragm, is that it occurs gradually over a long period of time and does not happen suddenly. It becomes a swelling inside the abdomen because the diaphragm presses upon the intestines."
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	"And the symptom of it is when it is due to a separation of the diaphragm, because at the beginning it suddenly causes intense pain; and it becomes a distinct swelling apparent near the navel or apparently gone, which is due to protrusion of the intestines, with the body of that protruding through the defect in the diaphragm."
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	"And sometimes the intestinal tissue is forgotten outside the intestines and this type of hernia is called 'incarcerated'.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	"And sometimes there is flatulence, and sometimes the intestines slip through the hole in the abdomen and get caught there, which causes great danger of illness. And sometimes it causes very painful pain, especially when pressed upon."
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	"And in the treatment of these kinds of illnesses with iron, there is fear because care must be taken not to cause further injury in that place."
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	"And the manner of operating on this is that you command the patient to reduce the intestines with his own hand into their natural position if they obey, and then cover them up quickly with a dressing between your hands, raising the edges."
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	"And then, after that, you stretch the cord which is above the cord of the testicles to that side and incise it throughout its length, and then place two clamps on both sides of the incision according to your needs to open the incision with them."
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	"And if the incision is made as much as is possible so that no part of that wound may be forgotten."
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	"And then, you dissect away those membranes which are near the cord of the testicles until the white, hard abdominal wall is discovered on each side."
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	"Then you insert your finger into that which is the testicle, between the white abdominal wall, which is near the wound of the cord and behind the second membrane, and separate with it any adherence that may be there."
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	"And then move with your hand the cord of the testicles to its proper place, and at the same time extend the white abdominal wall upwards with your left hand, elevate the wound with the membrane at the side of the incision; and command the assistant to extend the wound upwards while you dissolve any adhesions behind with cold water."
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	"And then carefully examine with your fingers that there is no cause of the intestines being wrapped in the white abdominal wall."
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	"But if you find any cause there, then remove it to the abdomen outside."
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	"And then you take a needle with a large thread of catgut through which you pass it behind the membrane, which is below the cord of the testicles, and cut off the ends of the thread that protrude from the membrane so that there are four threads. Then place some of them over each other in the form of a cross; and tie with them the membrane of which we have spoken, which is near the cord of the testicles, with strong tying of two parts."
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	"And then wrap the ends of the threads and tie them with a strong knot, ensuring that none of the vessels that nourish those parts can transmit any cause through which an abscess may arise."
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	"And then place another knot over the first one at a distance of three fingers; and then these two knots will leave behind the membrane which is near the cord of the testicles as much as the thickness of your finger, and cut off the rest around it in a round manner, leaving the wound open."
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	"And then make an incision on the side of the cord of the testicles through which blood and pus may flow out in the manner that we have described earlier."
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	"And then apply lanolin soaked in oil and place it on the wound; and apply the stitching that we have recommended (and sometimes cauterize the white membrane which we mentioned near the incision of the blood vessel, for many times this happens) and leave the stitches so that they fall by themselves."
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	"But if the closing of the wound is delayed, then hot water should be poured over it and placed on it until it falls according to what we have said."
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	"And then treat the wound with other methods for treating wounds until it is healed."
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter LXVI
De hernia ventosa.	About ventral hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this type of hernia, there is nothing that can be burned with hot irons to treat it.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	"The first days said that it is done thus as we have recounted in the case of hernia with urine; which is to tie the vessels near the section with ease and speed; and immediately seal in the middle place around the abscess with whatever works that."
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	"And treat the plague according to what we have said until it is healed."
Capitol .lxvii.	"What is chapter lxvii?"
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	"The dressing done on the veins"
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	"Sometimes there is rupture in the veins as we have said, and inflammation occurs."
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	"And do not give any cause for the bowels to the jenny; and if you do, it is little; and returns in all hours."
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	"But if the time is prolonged with this, an adjusted fissure occurs in the scrotum through which the bowel enters the scrotum; and this happens because of the extension of the scrotum which is in the veins as we have said, which causes the scrotum to be softened, and the place becomes abscessed and inflamed."
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	"And the treatment for this is with caustic as it is preceded by its narrative."
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	"And sometimes it is cured with iron in this manner: that the patient lies on his back between two pillows, and immediately cuts off the swollen area of the ruptured abscesses inflamed by section through the width of three fingers."
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	"And then strengthen the scrotum with cold water that is below the neck until it is exposed."
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	"Then take a piece of cloth and place it over the inflamed area of the scrotum, and press it against the front of the abdomen."
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	"And then cut off both inflated areas at the end of the scrotum's vein, and adjust them with stitching one to the other."
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	"And then extract the end of the vein, and do not insert anything into the scrotum at all, nor extend it, nor any other cause such as you may know in the treatment of intestinal hernia."
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	"And then cure it with the treatment of wounds, and when you incise the skin, cleanse it and restore the wound until it is consolidated; for the scrotum is contracted and the swelling of rupture is not adjusted."
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	"And caustic is better in this location, because it is closer to health."
Capitol .lxviii.	"Chapter lxviii."
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	"On the softening of the neck of the testes."
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	"Often in some men, the chain of the testicles is softened because the flesh between them is softened. It is said that this is the cause."
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	"Therefore it is necessary for the one who seeks care to make the patient lie down on their side, and cut away all the softened chain above the natural one; then immediately join the lips with stitches."
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	"And if desired, first excise the excess of the softened chain with three or four stitches and firm suture."
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	"Then cut between the sutures, and afterwards cure it with treatment for other sores until it heals and the skin falls off."
Capitol .lxix.	"Chapter LXIX."
De castracio.	"Of castration."
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	"Know that castration is condemned in our law, but for the sake of knowledge it is permissible for me to remember this in this book; and it is not necessary to remember it except for two methods, one of which is so that this may be known by the science of medicine when it happens, how the treatment of it should be performed; and the other method is because we often have need of castration in other beasts for our own profit through them, as with dogs, goats, pigs, and similar beasts."
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	"And therefore I say that castration is performed in two ways: either by tearing or by cutting with an incision."
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	"But in the one which is performed by tearing, the manner of performing it is that we seize the beast in cold water until its testicles are softened and relaxed and hanging."
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	"And then take them with your hand so that they are resolved and do not appear loose from the touch."
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	"But in castration performed by incision and cutting, it is necessary that you hold the beast and press the cord of its testicles with your left hand."
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	"And then cut the suspensory ligament, and make an incision above each one with a single cut so that two openings are produced."
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	"And then cut those that appear protruding."
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	"And do not touch the scrotum with any instrument, but only use the sharp scalpel which is on the vessels."
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	"And this manner of castration by tearing is better because it leaves no cause for the testicles so that the beast desires copulation."
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	"And then dress the wound so that it heals."
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter LXX
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	Of the treatment of Hermaphrodism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	"Hermaphrodism in men occurs in two ways: one is when it appears in what should be the space between the testicles, where there are two testicles that resemble a vulva with skin at their base."
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	"And sometimes urine flows from where it should be the cord of the testicles."
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	"But in women, it is one type: that is when the vulva over the pubis resembles two testicles of a man, somewhat diminished at their connection to the fornix like the penis of a man and two testicles."
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	"And its treatment is of three types: two for men and one for women."
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	"And it is necessary that you make an incision in those attached flesh where the opening appears and then dress it with the dressing of other wounds."
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	"And in the second type of men where urine flows from where it should be the cord of the testicles, there is no cure nor operation for it."
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXII.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of Lentigo and protruding flesh due to causes of women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	"Freckles are naturally attached and appear as raised spots, which are caused by gazing too much and observing carefully. And sometimes they are larger in some women to the extent that they are spread out like those of men and even enter into copulation."
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, it is necessary that you grasp the excessiveness of freckles with your hand or with an ointment and cut them.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	"And do not finish cutting off completely, especially on the surface of the skin, so that bleeding does not occur."
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	"And then dress it with the dressing for wounds so that it heals."
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	"But flesh that is born is flesh that grows in the horrorific of the mother until it fills that space, and usually appears at the fornix according to its resemblance to excrement (and for this reason some people first called it “excremental disease”); therefore, we should cut it like we cut freckles and dress it so that it heals."
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter LXXII.
De curacio de alratica.	Of the treatment of hemorrhoids.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	"Hemorrhoids are when the vulva is not perforated or when it has a small opening."
E es o natural o accidental.	"And they can be either natural or accidental."
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	"Accidental hemorrhoids are caused by previous illness and are made either by attached flesh that is born or by a thin scalp or thick skin."
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	"And they are formed either on the surface of the mother's pudendum, or on its sides, or above it, or below it, and prevent copulation and pregnancy and childbirth, and usually prevent menstruation."
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	"And the diagnosis of hemorrhoids is made by observation of the vulva if the opening is visible, but if not, you should examine it with your fingers or with a speculum."
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	"But if the opening is due to a thin scalp and appears between the two lips of the vulva, then you should cut it with scissors."
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	"And if it is paused on both sides of the pudendal lips, then press your fingers at both sides close to its edges."
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	"And the woman should be on her back with her buttocks spread wide, and then extend both lips of the vulva with force so that the thin scalp is broken and the opening is uncovered."
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	"And then take some wool moistened in oil and press it over that place, and leave it there overnight so that the wound does not adhere."
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	"But if the scalp is thick and coarse, then you should cut it with a broad or sharp scalpel made of myrtle."
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	"But if the opening is due to attached flesh, then suspend that with an ointment and cut it."
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	"And use medications that stop bleeding without biting, such as aloes, dragon's blood, and mallow mixed with egg white."
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	"And then insert a wide lead cannula to prevent the wound from adhering lightly."
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	"And keep it like that for several days and apply a poultice of dried flaxseed."
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	"And then dress it with the other dressing for consolidation until it is healed."
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	"But sometimes it happens that during childbirth other flesh grows naturally in the mother's pudendum, and then you should cut it like this:"
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	"But if this is due to a hard boil in the mother's pudendum, then do not use any iron instrument in any way."
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter LXXIII.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	Of the treatment of hemorrhoids and tail and red boil that occur in the vulva of women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	"Hemorrhoids are caused by many veins in that area, from which blood flows continuously; and when these hemorrhoids become old and hard, they are called piles."
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	"Now I have mentioned the types of hemorrhoids and their characteristics, and let me say which ones require treatment and which do not."
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	"I say that hemorrhoids and piles, when they are in the front of the anus and cannot be felt, there is no need for treatment with iron."
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	"But those which are at the opening of the anus and can be felt, are those that require treatment."
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	"And it is necessary to put the woman in a warm bath and then extend her anus with tweezers or rough cloth, and incise those with the scissors."
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	"And then sprinkle over them the flows of blood from one of the incised veins without biting it, such as cinnamon and similar to that."
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	"And then let her rest on her back for an hour, and then immerse her in warm water."
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	"And if the bleeding persists, then make her drink a decoction of sumac and buckthorn and oak bark and similar things."
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	"And also take barley flour and mix it with honey and vinegar and make a plaster with that over her back."
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	"And if the bleeding is stopped, then it is good. And if not, then make it adhere with two compresses, and to the nipples without incision."
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	"And also take wool and immerse it in juice of coriander or juice of rue or juice of guaiacum with white wine, and make it adhere to the place. And then cure the place with egg white until it is healed."
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	"But if it is of harsh regard, then you must incise that which appears to you of that which I have said in the above manner."
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	"And cure it until it is healed."
Capitol .lxxiv.	"Chapter 74."
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of the perforation of a hollow accident in the hand.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Many kinds of accidents happen in the hand, such as cancer and stone apostumes and ulcers and adhesions and serpents and fistulas and hemorrhoids and wounds and other apostumes.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	"And I have already said these illnesses and their kinds and their signs and their cures in the division."
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	"But it is necessary that I say in this treatise of cauterization how one does it when it happens in the hand if it is of those apostumes that heal, and if you want to know in what manner the operation is done with iron."
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	"Therefore you must consider if the pain of the apostume at its beginning is sharp with percussion and swelling and fever, and if it becomes reddened and if it seems to catch on something, then do not cut it with perforation, but cure it with what helps maturation until the sharpness of the accident ceases."
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	"But then you must make her lie on her back on two pillows; and let her recline on her two sides and adjust her feet toward the foot of the bed a little below the navel, and let her thighs be expanded, and tie her arms away from her breasts, and bind each with cloth appropriately."
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	"And then the midwife follows on the right side and administers the instrument with which the perforation of the hand is done, whose form will come in those causes that they will do later."
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	"And it is necessary that when you want to administer this instrument, you put on the wrist of the woman's hand, and only let what enters the hand from the instrument be the wrist of the hand and the sick part."
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	"But if the instrument is larger than the wrist of the hand, then you must put poultices on the texture of the wrist of the hand so that it may be prohibited the entrance of any instrument into the wrist of the hand."
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	"And it is necessary that you put the point of the instrument on the left side above and that the one administering holds the instrument and turns the point until the perforation of the hand is done."
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	"And when the exit appears, and it is touched with the hand and is swollen and moist, then you must dry it with a linen cloth."
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	"And when the healing is evacuated, then you must put in the wound a wool wick immersed in rose oil or green oil with some astringency; and press the bandage on the section of the wrist of the hand."
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	"And then put on the hand, and on the wound, clean wool immersed in water in which mulberries have been boiled."
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	"Then let it be cured for two days with this ointment that is convenient until it is healed."
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	"And sometimes the hand and the wound are washed with water and honey, and sometimes with water in which rose leaves or long pepper has been boiled, and then it returns to the ointment."
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	"And if the wound is deep in the hand and infected, then you must be prohibited from curing it with iron, having cure of it with what we have said in this division."
Capitol .lxxv.	"Chapter 75."
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	"To teach midwives in what manner they should medicate the living babies that come out deformed according to figure."
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	"It is necessary that the midwife knows at the beginning the figure of a natural childbirth by its signs, and it is that when you see the woman pushing at the openings below and desires to smell the air, and then she is comforted by what is coming out on top of her, and hastens the exit of the baby, then you would know that this birth is according to nature's figure, and the baby exits headfirst, and the second one with its arms or suspended or hanging from the umbilical cord."
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	"Therefore when you see those signs, then it is necessary that the belly of the baby be pressed so that the embryo comes out gently when it comes out headfirst, and the second one with its arms or suspended or hanging from the umbilical cord, and is cleaned from those superfluities with good cleansing."
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu i, o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	"But that which is other than this birth is unnatural and blameworthy, for when the baby comes out on its feet and its body comes out in front of its head and its feet, and one hand or the foot is out, or the head and one hand are out, or the belly is out, and it turns its face up and has similar blameworthy figures."
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	"It is necessary that the midwife be wise and subtle in all those causes, and guard against error and deception."
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	"And here we show all figures of those, and what kind they are in those so that it may be signified by this and stood upon."
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	"When the feet are out headfirst by nature's error, and that one is violent on the woman and its birth is difficult, and you see its strength already weakened, then do this: have those women hold it, and evaporate its congealed blood with ground fenugreek and moist oil."
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	"Then the midwife should insert her little spatula and split it with that, or cut it with her nail until what is in it of moisture comes out."
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	"And press the woman's belly until the fetus comes out."
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	"But if it does not come out, then have the woman be rinsed with poultice of pitch and poultice of fenugreek with hot water."
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	"And then command her to be pressed again and have her sneeze with condition; and close its mouth and nose for an hour, because the fetus will soon forget."
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	"If both hands of the patient are forgotten at the beginning, then you must return them gently, one by one."
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	"But if the patient does not obey, then pause the woman on one knee and lift her feet up, and then quickly hit the knee on the ground. And the woman must be careful not to fall due to the blow."
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	"And if the hands are not properly returned and the patient dies, then cut them off and remove the remnants of the fetus or tie the body with cloth and remove it evenly, because that will be forgotten."
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	"Of the extraction of the embryo from its seat."
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	"When the fetus is lying on its seat, then you must push those down, and immediately turn the fetus gently, and immediately that you equalize it, and immediately that you grasp one foot and gradually extend it."
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	"But when it is extracted inside the womb, then you must command the patient to squeeze, and make that sneeze with condition, because she will be forgotten if God wishes."
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	"And if it is not forgotten with what we have recommended, then you must gradually return the fetus inside until you pause it according to its natural figure, because that will be forgotten at that time with easy extraction."
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	"And if it is prohibited with all that we have recommended, then take some muslin and dissolved gum Arabic, and grind them well in the mortar with good percussion, and immediately line the woman's womb, the lower part of her belly with it."
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	"And immediately make that sit in warm water until she achieves hypothermia."
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	"And when the parts of it are cleaned, then do fumigation with myrtle and immediately apply compresses to her."
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	"And when she has had fumigation for an hour, then make her sit on a chair and immediately make her sneeze and extend the mouth of it, and remove that, and apply gentle pressure to the lower part of her belly with a compress, because the fetus will be forgotten shortly."
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	"Extraction of the fetus on its fontanelles and membranes."
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	"When the fetus is extracted in this manner, then gently insert its membranes gradually; and also let the woman lay on her back with her hips raised up, and that should be lying on the bed, and complete its membranes."
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	"And also press gently on her belly gradually, and also extract what is left behind her ears until it is prepared in the lower part."
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	"And if the fetus is not forgotten, then take her hips and move them violently, and also press what is on the hypochondria gradually until the fetus comes out from above."
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	"And also insert its membranes and gently twist the fetus gradually, and command the woman to squeeze until the fetus is forgotten."
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	"Lateral extraction of the fetus by one of its membranes."
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	"It should be gently reduced with her hand, but if she cannot reduce it, then raise the woman and make her walk."
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	"And if she cannot walk, then make her lie on the bed, and strike her buttocks violently with your hand, and immediately administer remedies that you know and have recommended of mucilages."
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	"And if childbirth has come, then make her sit on a chair and immediately study the reduction of the hand and twist the fetus according to its natural figure, and make the woman sneeze and command her to press herself until it is forgotten."
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	"Extraction of the fetus over the occupit with its membranes expanded and its face towards its mother's back."
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	"It is necessary for the midwife to have her hand on the fetus and also turn it little by little, and make that come out with ease."
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	"And when it is coming out and when it has been twisted, then pause on its crown what we have recommended of oil and of mucilages."
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	"And also command her to push little by little, and when you have done that, then make her sit on a chair and command her to lean over the right side, and also command her to press herself; and make her sneeze conditionally."
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	"Prepared exit of the fetus over the side [of the uterus]."
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	"When it becomes horrible for the mother in this manner, consider her and then incise the second one with your nail until it is emptied of humidity."
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	"And if the fetus is suspended over its face and occupit, then incise that of the amniotic sac so that it may not be retained and die."
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	"And also push the fetus downwards until it pauses according to what is necessary, and command the woman to press herself several times, and it will be forgotten with gentle extraction if God wills it."
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	"Exit of twins or multiple fetuses."
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	"Know that many times twins are born, and sometimes three or four, but that is strange and rarely happens; but their cause is natural and not violent."
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	"And count them if they are multiplied, there should be one amniotic sac for each of them, and they are separated by chiasmus, distinguish them by the ligament in the umbilical cord of each of them. And sometimes they come out just like one fetus through natural gentle extraction, and sometimes they come out through non-gentle extraction as we have recommended."
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	"And if some of them are difficult to deliver and come through what we have said about the unnatural figures, then care for them as we have recommended."
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	"And if the midwife is subtle and does what she does with ease and subtlety, and with diligence, and acts according to all figures as it is prepared for her in leading towards health."
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	"Reminder of what forms in the matrix from embryos and aborts."
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	"Sometimes one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and even ten are formed in the mother's womb, and it has been verified that one woman aborted seven, and another ten all formed, which cause was made by the measurement of the glorious wise men."
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	"And also it is necessary that the midwife knows well how to examine this small form and therefore pause according to what is necessary."
Capitol .lxxvi.	"Chapter 76."
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	"Of the extraction of the fetus when it is dead."
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	"When you care for the dead fetus with what we have said in the division of medicine and it has not come out yet, and you wish to use an operation by hand, then it is necessary that you consider if the woman is of sound virtue and not affected by any of the accidents by which she might suffer harm."
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	"Then it is necessary that the woman be placed on the bed on her back and her head reclined downwards and her buttocks raised."
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	"And the assistant should hold her from both sides or be lying in the bed to prevent the body from stretching out during the extraction of the fetus."
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	"And also you should moisten the mouth of the mother with oil and mucilage of marshmallow, fenugreek, and linseed."
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	"And also the midwife should anoint her hand with those oils and mucilages, and also insert her hand gently into the mother's womb, and also search with her hand for where the hooks will be placed on the fetus."
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	"And the convenient places for this are: then you should consider if the fetus is prepared to be delivered headfirst, and therefore place the hooks in its heels, or neck, or mouth, or palate, or jaw, or furcula, or nearby the ribs, or below the hypochondria."
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	If the discharge is over his feet, then in the groin or middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And one must have the hook in the right hand and pause its curve in that place which is between the fingers of the left hand, inserting the hand gently and keeping the hook in one of those places we mentioned earlier until reaching the cause of the blockage.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	Then pause and place another hook, or the third one if necessary, in such a way that there is attraction equally on all sides, and not only extension according to its own rectitude.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And let it be moved in every part so that the discharge of it is alleviated just as it is done in the extraction of a tooth.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary that the extension be softened in water; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife must grease some of her fingers with oil and insert them carefully and move them around with the water that is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore if the part of the fetus has been expelled, then the hooks must be changed to one that is larger; and do this until the entire fetus has been expelled.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is already expelled but cannot be reduced by traction of it, then a cloth should be wrapped around that one and immediately cut it at its junction or at the wrist.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And similarly you must do with the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large or there is difficulty in its expulsion, or it is in a caput fixed position, then one must insert spatulas between those bones and cleave the head and extract the water, or dilate that with an instrument called "alundat" whose form will come along with the forms of the other instruments in the chapter which follows this.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly do if the fetus is naturally large headed: and then you must cut it with an emollient or dilate it with an alundat as we have said; and immediately extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is expelled but is obstructed by the foramen magnum, then you must cut it until the humidity that is in the pituitary gland is drained out.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if there is no complication or obstruction to its expulsion, then you must cut the head as much as it is possible for you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the left side of the abdomen is inflamed or it is in a hydrops condition, then you must pierce it until the humidity that is within it is drained out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fetus is lying on its back, then the traction of it will be easy and directing it towards the mother's vulva will also be easy.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is obstructed near the abdomen and the pituitary gland, then you must extract that with cloth which you will have wrapped around your hand, and then cut the abdomen and the pituitary gland until that water flows out of them.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other members are obstinate and the head returns back, then insert your left hand; but if the mother's vulva is obstructed, then insert your hand into the lower abdomen and encircle the head with it, and pull it towards the mother's vulva, and immediately insert a hook or two hooks and pull it with those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mother's vulva is obstructed by a hard clots of blood which has accumulated there, then you must not rub it over it. Rather, you must administer an injection of hot water to dissolve the thick and fatty causes.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And apply plasters; and follow up with the patient in waters that soften and moisturize.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is lying on its side, then if it is possible, you should turn it; and administer to it what we have said for a live fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	But if that is not possible, then cut it in pieces and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And you must not leave any cause behind in the uterus.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed your operation, then administer to her what we have said about the treatment of hard clots of blood that may have occurred in the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there is bleeding, then apply styptic waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman whose uterus contained a dead fetus, and later she became pregnant again, but the second time also the fetus was dead.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened that for a long time there was a hard clot of blood in her uterus; it became inflamed and started to expel, but the fetus died.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat her for this, and treated her for a long time, but the illness did not improve.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied to her some plasters with strong attraction, and about three days later she expelled one bone, and after a few more days she expelled another bone. And I was greatly amazed, because there are no bones in the uterus.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Therefore I healed her illness and extracted from her many bones, the woman living in good health ever since, except for some slight bleeding.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I do not affirm that this is strange, but rather it shows the knowledge and skill of the doctor who with his hands administers treatment to cure.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments necessary for extracting the fetus
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of forceps with which the mother is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a forceps in which the tongs are attached to two pieces of wood.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this forceps must be more slender and made either of iron or brass or boxwood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And let each piece of wood be two fingers wide and the edge of each one a finger's width apart, and its length one and a half palms; and in the middle of the two pieces of wood there are two joints for fitting together these pieces of wood which are already fastened, and their length is about one and a half palms, and their width two fingers or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two additions are inserted into the mother's vulva so that it is opened with them when you turn the two prescribed forceps.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form, but more slender and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Let it be made of brass or boxwood according to the shape of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But instead at its end let there be two additions like this: and the length of each addition is about one palm, and their width two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the mother with these, then have the woman lie on her back with her feet raised up high, and open what is between the lips of it.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument as you do with forceps attached according to how much you want of the opening of the mother's vulva where you want the uterus to be opened.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of forceps described by the ancients:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of a probe with which the fetus is pushed:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of a hook with which the large head is grasped
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is like a forceps with teeth at the end like this: and sometimes it is made long like this forceps according to this form, like this: with teeth like those of a rake with which it is inserted and grasps.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of a small hook:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	"A shape having a spine."
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	"A shape having two spines."
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	"A forceps with teeth that close and hold the baby's head in place."
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	"A spatula having two ends where the head is severed."
Forma de dos espatums latz:	"Form of two spatulas lying side by side."
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	"The more these instruments are exercised, and the more species of them there are prepared by the artisans, the easier their operation becomes, and the greater the number of people they benefit."
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	"And you should not neglect any of those instruments, for the need for them is not excusable."
De extraccio de la segondina.	"For extracting the afterbirth."
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	"When the afterbirth is retained at childbirth, you must order the midwife to hold her breath, and then make her sneeze with conditions, and press your hand over her mouth and nose. If it comes out by this means, so much the better."
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	"And if not, then take a cloth and pierce it with a hole in the middle, and put it over the mother's mouth, having first burned some herbs such as calamint, rue, aneth, chamomile, Arabic scordium, cassia wood, and Saint John's wort."
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	"All these herbs or some of them should be immersed in water in the cloth, and then placed on the fire."
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	"And immediately place a reed cane into the mother's mouth, and hold it there until the steam comes to the concave part of her."
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	"And then make her sneeze as we have said, and the afterbirth will be expelled with great speed."
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	"But if even with this treatment the afterbirth is not expelled, then you should order the midwife to immerse her left hand in olive oil or an emulsion of althea, and then insert it into the womb and search for the afterbirth with that, and when she has found it, take it out little by little. But if it is adherent in the entrance of the mother, then insert your hand as we have recommended, and when you have found the afterbirth, remove it little by little according to rectitude so that the mother does not suffer from violent traction."
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	"It is necessary that they be changed on the right and left sides with ease."
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	"And then it should be adjusted in the amount of traction, for it will obey and evacuate itself from adhesions."
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	"And if the mother's mouth is obstructed, we have already recommended the treatment with sneezing and the medication of the cloth with herbs."
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	"But if it is not expelled with all the causes we have recommended, then be sure not to weary yourself in repeated attempts at traction, but rather what has come out from there to the mother's mouth should be placed on the thing of the woman, and then dress that with grease and tetrafarmacon; for that will cause it to rot there after a few days and will be dissolved and expelled."
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	"But when it has rotted, it causes bad odor to the head and stomach, and that leads to illness. And then fumigations and appropriate remedies should be administered for that."
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	"But some of the Ancients used fumigation with nasturtiums and dried figs."
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	"Form of an instrument with which a woman is fumigated due to the retention of menses and afterbirth:"
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	"It should be made of glass or earthenware."
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	"And the subtle extremity should be placed in the womb and the wide extremity over the fire, and the fumigation should be placed on the embers of the fire."
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	"And keep that there until that fumigation is consumed, and repeat another one."
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	"On the treatment of the unperforated anus of a child:"
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	"Many children are born with their anuses unperforated, which are often narrow and closed."
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	"Therefore, it is necessary for the midwife to perforate that closure with her finger; and if not, then perforate it with a sharp spatula, being careful not to touch the intestine."
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	"And then place over it wool soaked in wine and oil, and treat it with grease until healed."
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	"But if you fear that it is closed again, then place in the anus a cannula for several days, and remove it when the child wants to defecate."
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	"And it also happens that the anus becomes closed due to consolidation of a plug or an abscess. Therefore, that consolidation should be incised and then treated with what we have said about treatment and lead."
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	"On the treatment of fistulas that develop in this place:"
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	"The fistulas that develop in the lower part of the buttocks are usually hard and thick, which develop near the anus or in the space between the two buttocks."
E es una fistula o motas.	"And it is one fistula or more."
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	"And when that hardness has become ancient and corroded by moisture, it is usually accompanied by offensive white pus or subtle putrefaction. And sometimes there are penetrating fistulas in these fistulas."
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	"And these penetrate through what comes out of them through the exit and through windiness. And sometimes the condition is that of exit, and often worms come out from them."
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	"And sometimes there are penetrating fistulas in the space that penetrate into the bladder and into the urethra. And these penetrations also occur into the junction of the vulva and into the anus."
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.
